body:
Story goes..

Men cant get an erection anymore and only 4 people in the world can. MC finds out he gets can get an erection. Thats why all the girls in class are looking at him.

Teacher finds out and decide to make him his. So she does everything to make sure he onky goes crazy for her. Thats why she sent pics or pissed in front of him.

In the end she wanted him to get her pregnant, and MC decide that he wants to make her his woman. Si yoi see the wedding ring on the ground covered in MC cum.
Loved this, imagine it in english and uncensored... Every teen guy's dream with his hot ass teacher.
It's been a while since ur last English translated doujin sir shuuten douji Sama. Pls, translate this one too !
